U.S. experts revealed: McDonald's and other fast-food raw m

<p><img border="0" style="width: 230px; height: 206px" alt="" src="http://himg2.huanqiu.com/attachment2010/111018/393dfe8211.jpg"; /></p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</a></strong> Mentioned that fast-food raw materials, I am afraid many people will blurt out: beef, lettuce, bread and potatoes. But you know what? You eat far beyond these types of raw materials. According to statistics, McDonald's Big Mac hamburger, although on the surface of only seven ingredients, but in fact with a total of 67 kinds of raw materials. National nutrition experts William Harris, based on McDonald's, KFC and other fast-food chain's five surveys, and with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration list of common food ingredients and pigments cf analysis, lists the 10 most common fast food ingredients, and point out several raw materials may cause health problems.</p><p>1. High Fructose Corn Syrup:</p><p>The most common sweetener. Fructose syrup because of its low price and antiseptic greatly welcome the fast food industry, often appear in a number of baked foods and beverages. However, doubts over the years HFCS has never stopped. It is reported that adding HFCS in many processed foods, high-calorie but low nutrition, high intake may lead to cardiovascular disease and diabetes.</p><p>2. Soybean Oil:</p><p> <strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-pumps-c-19.html">christian louboutin pumps</a></strong> The most common oils or fats. Soybean oil used in fast food fried food, but also margarine, dessert of the important raw materials. Because soybean oil contains unsaturated fatty acids, not long-term preservation, hydrogenation can reduce this disadvantage. However, hydrogenated oils produce trans fatty acids, increased blood viscosity, speed up atherosclerosis, increased cardiovascular disease risk. Many European countries have begun to ban hydrogenated oils, but in China, is still widely used in fast-food industry.</p><p>3. Citric acid:</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-sandals-c-21.html">christian louboutin sandals</a></strong> The most common preservative. It exists in the lemon, grapefruit and other fruits, the acidity can increase the microbial environment, growth and reproduction of bacteria is difficult. Although the citric acid will not harm the human body digestive system, but it will promote the body's excretion of calcium and the deposition may result in hypocalcemia, and increase the risk of duodenal cancer risk.</p>

16 star lineup composed of the most luxurious world tour

<p><img border="0" style="width: 245px; height: 176px" alt="" src="http://img1.gtimg.com/sports/pics/hwww.80/37/886/57621665.jpg"; /></p><p><strong><a href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</a></strong> October 20, when Stern and Hunter are still negotiating for the efforts to save the season, the league's superstars have decided that they will conduct a ten-day global tour exhibition. According to reports, Bryant, James, Wade, Anthony, Paul, Griffin, etc. are likely to participate in 16 major stars, called the history of the most luxurious exhibition line-up.</p><p><strong><a href="http://sonicebag.com/chanel-handbag-c-5.html">chanel outlet</a></strong> Tour of the overall plan has been settled, but there are still some details remain to be determined. It is reported that the ten-day tour, from October 31 until November 10. During this time, this should be opened when the NBA regular season, but talks broke down last time, Stern has announced the cancellation of the regular season two weeks of events. Tour will be in Puerto Rico, London, Macau and Australia have started in London and Australia, NBA star who will play two exhibition games.</p><p><strong><a href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</a></strong> From the current situation, exhibition of the lineup is extremely powerful, Kobe Bryant, LeBron James, Dwyane Wade, Rose, Anthony, Paul, Amare Stoudemire, Chris Bosh, Rondo, Pierce, Griffin, Westbrook Boozer and Fuji music has been identified in this, and like Kevin Garnett and Kevin Durant, may also join. Howard can not make the trip a few superstars, one of this summer because he has visited 15 countries, World of Warcraft need a good rest.</p><p><strong><a href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/gucci-shoes-c-83.html">Gucci Shoes</a></strong> During the lockout, players hold exhibition games, it is not surprising. League encounter back in 1998 shut down, many of the players on the organization of exhibition games in the U.S. West Coast cities. This year, like James, Durant and other players, but also organize a lot of charity game, and achieved good results, Kobe is playing exhibition games to the Philippines. But this time the world tour exhibition, both in scale and star lineup, will exceed far more than the previous charity event or exhibition. Fans around the world, will usher in a visual feast.</p>

From Misurata's "Tiger Force" captured Gaddafi.<BR><STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</A></STRONG> Earlier, the ruling authorities in Libya's Sirte frontline commander Abu - Sarah Rahman told reporters that they had arrested Gaddafi, but Kakazhafei in the process of being arrested, face, legs shot in, were sent to Misurata in the way of his wounds and death. Currently, the media has released a cell phone allegedly taken Gaddafi's arrest photo. Photo, Gaddafi face covered in blood, look trance. <BR><STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com/chanel-handbag-c-5.html">chanel outlet</A></STRONG> According to another report, a spokesman Ibrahim al-Gaddafi regime also arrested near Sirte. The 11th Brigade's commander Jiagulile said, he saw Kareem Abdul-Jabbar Gaddafi's armed forces commander (Abu Bakr Younus Jabr) of the body. Kareem Abdul-Jabbar allegedly killed in the attack on Gaddafi's.

Stern marathon talks collapse

<p><img border="0" style="width: 243px; height: 169px" alt="" src="http://photocdn.sohu.com/20111021/Img322885715.jpg"; /></p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</a></strong> According to CBS Sports coverage, NBA's chief negotiator on behalf of Adam - Sili Fu disclosed Thursday in the United States, as Alliance president David - Stern suffering from a cold, so he did not appear that the morning team meeting, including NBA30 owner to participate in the Council meeting. The Sili Fu also said that because of the cold troubled, Stern is likely to miss two in the afternoon at another face to face meetings between employers and employees.</p><p>"He did not attend today because of flu and the NBA Board." Sili Fu said, "but I think this meeting we do not have any impact Mr. Stern still participate by telephone in the meeting were, but also in the discussion he is also reflected in the very active. "Sili Fu stressed that as the cold, Stern was unable to attend may be held in the afternoon a new round of talks between employers and employees live. But he also said that he and Stern will maintain close contact at any time.</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-pumps-c-19.html">christian louboutin pumps</a></strong> "He will continue to actively work at home, I would sit at the negotiating site, my cell phone in his pocket, he would have been kept buzzing sound." Sili Fu said, "The most likely situation is that Manchester Well do not appear in the negotiations this afternoon, but like I said, we will be a sufficient basis to Peter - Holt, owner of the recommendations of the committee, led the negotiations, although Stern does not appear in the scene negotiations, but During the negotiations, he will still be an active participant. "</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-sandals-c-21.html">christian louboutin sandals</a></strong> Two days after a total of 24.5 hours of negotiations, 69-year-old Mr. Stern could not have been a stare. In the United States President Barack Obama appointed federal mediator George - Cohen's intervention, both sides continue stalemate continues, or to make concessions to reach the settlement? After today's talks, this mystery will be revealed.</p>

Iverson announced to participate in charity game

<P><IMG style="WIDTH: 200px; HEIGHT: 164px" border=0 src="http://photocdn.sohu.com/20111025/Img323290439.jpg"; width=150 height=150></P><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan</A> Beijing October 25, Allen - Allen Iverson has gone a long time, the news of his many fans waiting to no avail, to know his current situation, to confirm whether he is retired, and now he appeared. According to ESPN reports, Iverson held a press conference, announced that he will host two charity event in Las Vegas. Long news, Iverson will attend charity event in Las Vegas, but this news has not been confirmed. Iverson has said before Philadelphia to participate in charity game, but he eventually did not take place. So once again announced that it will participate in the Iverson charity race in Alaska, many people hold the dubious attitude, that he may again miss it. However, the "answer" to personally preside over this conference, charity event to dispel people's doubts, he had this really want to play. <BR><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/prada-shoes-c-90.html">Prada Shoes</A> Iverson is actively training in preparation for the upcoming charity event, perhaps back to prepare for the future. Iverson was injured in the foot, Turkey there came news of a serious foot injury that he may lead him directly to retire. Iverson quickly denied the news, he said so himself after being wounded, taking into account Australia to play. At the same time, Iverson also expressed willingness to return to the NBA.<BR><STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</A></STRONG> "Iverson may have many drawbacks, such as too fond of his attack style of some selfish, but we the fans to see him play, he is to see this style is not it? If he changed that, he had not Iverson his time in Denver for Antonio's lead, and he no longer answers to the past, so no matter how, we like his style. "said one fan on the ESPN message. <BR><STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com/chanel-handbag-c-5.html">chanel outlet</A></STRONG> Injuries and age as Iverson's biggest enemy. Because of age, Iverson is not recognized by the Grizzlies coach Lionel Hollins has not marked the main position, and ultimately forced to leave Memphis. After leaving Memphis, Iverson also briefly joined the 76 people, but because the reasons for her illness, he again left the NBA team. Iverson eventually joined the Turkish team Besiktas team, which is now Deron Williams - Williams's team. Iverson is still generally in a state of Turkey, ultimately foot injury, led to his early return home.

United States and Europe warned against Syria "war&qu

"

20th consecutive year, the UN asked the U.S. end sanctions a

<STRONG><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</A></STRONG> 66th to 25th UN General Assembly overwhelmingly passed a resolution demanding an immediate end to the United States imposed on Cuba for nearly half a century of economic, trade and financial blockade. This is the General Assembly passed such a resolution for 20 consecutive years. <BR><STRONG><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/gucci-shoes-c-83.html">Gucci Shoes</A></STRONG> Submitted by Cuba the same day the UN General Assembly entitled "Necessity of ending the United States against Cuba's economic, commercial and financial embargo imposed by" vote on the draft resolution. General Assembly, 193 Member States, a total of 191 countries to vote, in which 186 countries voted to support, the only vote against the United States and Israel, Palau, Marshall Islands and Micronesia abstained. <BR>The resolution says, there are still Member States to enact and implement impact to other countries under its jurisdiction and sovereignty of the legitimate interests of entities or persons and the freedom of trade and navigation laws and regulations, such as the United States March 12, 1996 issued by the so-called "He Helms - Burton Act ", the UN General Assembly expressed concern.<BR><STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</A></STRONG> The resolution says the first 19 times since the adoption of such an agreement, which aimed at strengthening and extension of the Cuban economy, commercial and financial blockade of further measures continue to be promulgated and implemented, and the Cuban people and those living in other countries, Cuban nationals adversely affect the General Assembly again urged to exist and continue to apply such laws and measures in accordance with their legal system as soon as possible to take the necessary steps to repeal or invalidate. <STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com/chanel-handbag-c-5.html"><BR>chanel outlet</A></STRONG> The day of the UN General Assembly, the Group of 77, the Non-Aligned Movement, Caribbean Community, the African Union and the European Union and other international organizations and representatives of Cuba and other countries, strongly urged the U.S. immediately stop the blockade against Cuba.

U.S. growth is poor, the rich 15 times earnings gap between

<p><strong><a href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</a></strong> According to the U.S. Congressional Budget Office's latest report, from 1979 to 2007, the United States the richest 1% of the population's income increased by 2.75 times, while the poorest 20% of the population income increased by only 18% over the same period.</p><p><strong><a href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/gucci-shoes-c-83.html">Gucci Shoes</a></strong> The report also found that a phenomenon, the lower income strata, the smaller the increase in revenue over the past 30 years. Second only to the richest 1% of the population of the 20% rich, 28-year revenue growth of 6 to 5, although not the richest 1%, but still nearly 80% more than other segments of the population grew much faster. The report noted that, even without considering the sharp increase in income of the richest people, American or exacerbated income inequality.</p><p>Congressional Budget Office that the United States because most of the population surge in income is not very clear, probably due in part to technology innovation will help towards making the labor market actors, athletes, musicians and other super stars of the direction of development, but also makes the executives of salary increase, expand the scope of financial activities in the field.</p><p><strong><a href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</a></strong> EIU Country Risk Project Director Paul Le 26 on ABC, said technology to create opportunities for high-skilled workers, while filling some of the routine work seems redundant. Controversial role of globalization, some traditional support for free trade to the decision makers are suspected of globalization in the benefits of low-income American families in the end how much, even though these families do have cheaper imported products from the benefit .</p><p><strong><a href="http://sonicebag.com/chanel-handbag-c-5.html">chanel outlet</a></strong> Served as the Bush administration strategists horse monasticism was that, while the Americans to accept the reality of income inequality, not envy other people get rich, but they are for themselves and their children lost economic opportunities are deeper sense of frustration. He pointed out that people feel preferential treatment by the government business and the rich, make this frustration worse.</p>

James Anthony Paul out of world tour

<p><img border="0" style="width: 260px; height: 200px" alt="" src="http://img1.gtimg.com/sports/pics/hwww.213/143/891/57973953.jpg"; /></p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</a></strong> According to ESPN broke the news reporter Bruce Saad, James, Anthony and Paul suddenly miss it announced that it would withdraw from the world tour exhibition. But with Kobe, Howard, Wade, Durant and other stars of the competition line-up is still very strong, the history of the world tour is still one of the most luxurious of the exhibition.</p><p>The world tour exhibition for a period of two weeks, go to the world on four continents, played a total of six games. Long duration, long distance flight, the game density, the NBA star, can be considered no small burden. Therefore, since the report, the world exhibition tour has been different from the entry line.</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-pumps-c-19.html">christian louboutin pumps</a></strong> Somehow, the world exhibition tour plan has gone wrong. According to ESPN broke the news of Bruce Saad, James, Anthony and Paul suddenly three collective miss it announced its withdrawal from the world tour exhibition. The previously identified with the Rose and Westbrook out of the world exhibition tour suddenly lost five NBA All-Star Game.</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-sandals-c-21.html">christian louboutin sandals</a></strong> Of course, even if the loss of James, Anthony and other stars, star lineup of world tour competition is still very luxurious. After all, overseas, Bryant has been a box office guarantee, coupled with Howard's accession, and Wade, Durant's star sits this level, the popularity of the world tour will not be greatly affected.</p>

Iverson then the table will return to NBA AI: accept any rol

<p><img border="0" style="width: 258px; height: 197px" alt="" src="http://img1.gtimg.com/sports/pics/hwww.237/76/892/58021917.jpg"; /></p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</a></strong> Whether it is the Cleveland Cavaliers (bottom), Toronto Raptors (remote), Minnesota (bitter cold), Allen Iverson does not care. In an interview with Yahoo's correspondent Max Pierce interview, the league MVP in 2001 that "any team, any role, he is willing to accept."</p><p> <strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-pumps-c-19.html">christian louboutin pumps</a></strong> Despite 36 years of age, and in the Turkish league last season, suffered serious injuries, but Iverson still want to go back to end his NBA career. He is a 10-time All-Star, NBA people worship in scoring, he influenced a generation of basketball fans. However, continuous off-site problems and age brought by the state of decline, so Iverson's career stained stain. Detroit Pistons at Memphis Grizzlies for a season and a few games, he wrangling with management. Iverson refused to bench, refused to training, he gives us a never satisfied with the old state of mind. But the years do not forgive.</p><p><strong><a href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</a></strong> "Obviously there are some views that I do not want to help the team as a role player, but have been passed. This is an emotional idea, led me to play without the ball, and now I am willing to submit to arrangements to help the team. "Iverson said. "I want to have an NBA team to believe me, than to go abroad to find a chance to play much better."</p><p> <strong><a href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</a></strong> AI said he is now perfectly healthy, and can be restored within two weeks to the NBA game state. He hopes to prove I can still reach the NBA level, 12-13 November, he will star in Las Vegas hosted Super Challenge, which is the strength he prove himself a stage.</p>

Labor negotiations super shady exposure, Stern has bought Fi

<P><IMG style="WIDTH: 244px; HEIGHT: 177px" border=0 src="http://img1.gtimg.com/2/289/28951/2895156_550x550_0.jpg"; width=150 height=150></P><STRONG><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</A></STRONG> SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 30, "Fox Sports News" exposed material, which in labor negotiations, the two top labor leader Derek - Derek Fisher and Billy - Hunter is not the same boat. Hunter integrity, has been the benefit for the players, while Fisher was Stern buy between the two may have reached a private agreement disgraceful. <STRONG><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/gucci-shoes-c-83.html"><BR>Gucci Shoes</A></STRONG> The recent labor negotiations fail, the only reason is that both the revenue share (BRI) above differences. Bosses proposal is 50-50, and 52-48 players insist the bottom line. An insider said, the players union president Derek Fisher has become a NBA (microblogging) David - Stern stooge, Fisher promised he could make the players union to accept a 50-50 revenue-sharing proposal, but Hunter and at least one person involved in the negotiations the players union rejected Fisher's compromise. <BR><STRONG><A href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</A></STRONG> Fisher is a 15-year career with veteran, he has walked into the end of his career, is for their future consideration. In recent negotiations, Fisher is pushing 50-50 revenue-sharing ratio, but Hunter insisted 52-48 sharing ratio can not be shaken. Since Fisher's attitude has shifted suddenly, Hunter began to question the relationship between Fisher and Stern, Hunter began to doubt Stern Fisher has been bought. <BR><STRONG><A href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</A></STRONG> From now on, the players elected as the players union president Derek Fisher is the wrong decision. Time earlier this week, Steve and I - Nash, Grant - Hill made ??contact, they are the ones that really fit as the players union president of the selfless people. Players union president must be responsible for the 325 NBA players, and Fisher and Stern only responsible for the superstars. Currently, Fisher and Hunter are no longer on the same boat.

Biography recalls shark scores with The Red: friendship we w

<p><img border="0" style="width: 254px; height: 245px" alt="" src="http://img1.gtimg.com/sports/pics/hwww.197/6/895/58199102.jpg"; /></p><p><strong><a href="http://sonicebag.com//">louis vuitton bag</a></strong> Beijing News November 1, after the formal retirement, Shaquille O'Neal - the amateur life has become more colorful. In his forthcoming biography, the "big sharks" for the first time publicly with some of his - Kobe Bryant of the Lakers team scores when the holiday, of which there is still a focus on describing the "Flying Man" experience sexual assault, the interesting story between two men.</p><p><strong><a href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</a></strong> According to U.S. media "Deadspin" excerpt, behind Kobe Bryant's sexual assault, and O'Neill was "Flying Man" had a tit for tat dialogue. Bryant believes that after the accident in their own, as a teammate of O'Neal did not come forward, stand behind their support of their own. But once threatened to "kill Bryant." The "Shark" is to respond to, many times before in this invitation for Bryant, he did not show up, it seems that their relationship has long been rigid.</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</a></strong> Brian - Shaw was there, he said: "Bryant, why do you think? O'Neill held many meetings, you never attended. We invite you to away games, when to eat, you do not go to O'Neill invite you to join his You did not go to the wedding, you did not get married who invited us in and now you are in trouble, let us all to support you? We do not even know you. "At this time everyone began to criticism of Bryant, and O'Neal said of Bryant: "If you want to you have for Jim - Gray (ESPN hosted the famous, often by players scandal speculation, Shaquille O'Neal and Kobe Bryant when he also allegedly deteriorating relationship fueled) said things go and he said again, then I'll kill you. "</p><p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-pumps-c-19.html">christian louboutin pumps</a></strong> This is only O'Neal and Kobe Bryant about his hatred of the book's short description. However, these events also proved that two all-star players can magnify these small problems are infinite. The two inner extreme self-players, in jealousy, distrust in the case, is certainly no longer remain in effect with the team, which will have after O'Neal was traded to the Miami Heat after the words ... ...</p>

Syria deepened the crisis at home and abroad

<P><IMG style="WIDTH: 205px; HEIGHT: 214px" border=0 src="http://img1.gtimg.com/news/pics/hwww.178/240/895/58258753.jpg"; width=150 height=150></P><STRONG><A href="http://bestshoppingbox.com/">Air Jordan Shoes</A></STRONG> Libya is a foregone conclusion, the parties began to shift the focus of Syria. Recently, not only in Europe and America frequently clamor for Syrian military intervention, the United States and Syria also have recalled their ambassadors. A lawsuit played a "small red shoes" History

<p><strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/">christian louboutin shoes</a></strong> and Yves Saint Laurent patent dispute caused by the "Little Red Shoes" that trace the history of the "red shoes", we all know that this is the exclusive symbol of Christian Louboutin, Yves Saint Laurent, but in the recent production of shoes in , also found that significant LOGO. Christian Louboutin so angry, the YSL court. In litigation cases, Louboutin, said in February this year he has asked the Yves Saint Laurent brand stores in Manhattan to stop the red sole product, as it will cause consumers to confuse the two brands, suspected of cheating, and asked the defendant for compensation $ 1 million loss, and stop the production of similar products, but also pointed out that in 2008 he has been registered in the United States outside the red end of the design, but its owner YSL and Gucci Group were not available to respond and comment. However, YSL's spokesman said "red background" can not be seen as Louboutin's patent. Using the color red as the sole is very common practice! Back longer before His Majesty Louis XIV in the 17th century wore on red shoes, and then later the classic fairy tale film "The Wizard of Oz."</p><p> </p><p><img border="0" style="width: 204px; height: 218px" alt="" src="http://img7.ppsj.com.cn/431/4319/3266989932.gif"; /></p><p> </p><p>From a historical point of view, the right and the red-soled shoes have always been a status symbol. <strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-sandals-c-21.html">christian louboutin sandals</a></strong>, only the aristocracy made the red man to the heel. Red dye was still quite expensive, produced by a Mexican cochineal is made, only the nobility could afford. Later, the French Revolution, and slowly disappeared from sight.</p><p> </p><p><img border="0" style="width: 200px; height: 222px" alt="" src="http://img7.ppsj.com.cn/431/4319/3266997496.gif"; /></p><p> </p><p>"The Wizard of Oz" in the actress Dorothy wearing a pair of small red shoes in 1939, "The Wizard of Oz," the release further consolidate the "Little Red Shoes" and the magic of the wonderful links. U.S. MGM costume designer Adrian explains: "the little red shoes with round short, to the Great Depression and World War II brought a glimmer of hope that the darkness and innocence.</p><p> <strong><a href="http://christianlouboutinup.com/christian-louboutin-pumps-c-19.html">christian louboutin pumps</a></strong> emphasis on "red background" has always been the brand's most iconic design again look back at the Christian Louboutin and YSL's lawsuit door. In fact, whether Prada or Steve Madden, each vendor can produce red-soled shoes. Louboutin's focus is not on the use of color, but stressed that "red background" has always been the brand's most iconic design.</p>
